text: Nǐ [mù shèng] dāng jǐnggào rénlèi, dāng xíngfá jiànglín tāmen zhī rì, bù yì zhě jiāng shuō:“Wǒmen de zhǔ a! Qiú nǐ yánhuǎn wǒmen yīhuǐ'er, wǒmen yīdìng xiǎngyìng nǐ de zhàohuàn, yīdìng fúcóng shǐzhěmen.”[Yǒu huà shēng duì tāmen shuō]:“Nándào nǐmen yǐqián méiyǒu fāguò shì, nǐmen jué bù huì mièwáng ma?
